set.name: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 3 (Jokers): When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and at least one of them is Jokers, you may destroy this creature. If you do, use this creature's {MANA DRIVE}: ability. {MANA DRIVE}: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may choose a Jokers from among them, show it to your opponent and add it to your hand. Put the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4

card.name: Bg Newton Custom Panzer, Dragment Symbol

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent draws a card, you may draw the same number of cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -12000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.): ► Each of your opponent's creatures gets -3000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: Super Best! Duema Fest Pack: Volume 4
